attributes.action: Hold a 2nd EU Referendum as influential Leave Campaign lies are exposed
attributes.additional_details: The Leave Campaign has lied to and misled the British people on two major arguments to leave the EU; "to take back control of our borders" strongly implying an end to the freedom of movement and to "fund our NHS instead" of sending £350 million a week to the EU, which was later revealed as "a mistake." Therefore, the voting public have made their decision based upon a fictional reality after being deliberately misled, rendering the the result of the current referendum obsolete.
attributes.background: We hereby the undersigned, request a 2nd EU Referendum so the voting public can make their decision based on the facts about Leave Campaign's intentions for immigration and the NHS, which have been exposed, post-referendum.
